mapper.select: /*프로모션 결제 전 사용자 정보를 등록했는지 체크*/ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_user AS u WHERE u.user_first_height IS NOT NULL AND user_first_weight IS NOT NULL AND user_first_goal IS NOT NULL AND user_first_bmi IS NOT NULL AND u.user_id = #{userId}
/*같은 프로모션에 결제하였는지 확인*/ SELECT MAX(trainer_promotion_recruit_close_date) AS trainer_promotion_recruit_close_date FROM tb_matching_user_trainer AS m WHERE m.user_id= #{userId}

/*쿠폰리스트 목록 가져오기*/ SELECT c.user_coupon_code, c.user_id, c.user_coupon_validity_start, c.user_coupon_validity_end, c.user_coupon_reg_date, c.user_coupon_use_date, a.user_platform_coupon_details FROM tb_coupon_user AS c JOIN tb_coupon_platform_user AS a ON a.user_platform_coupon_code = c.user_platform_coupon_code WHERE c.user_id = #{userId};
mapper.insert:
/* 프로모션 리스트에 있으면 하나씩 증가 후 insert 처리 */ SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(1) = 0 THEN 'trainer_user_matching_001' ELSE CONCAT('trainer_user_matching_', LPAD(MAX(CAST(right(g.trainer_user_matching_code,3) AS DECIMAL)+1), 3, 0)) END AS trainerUserMatchingCode FROM tb_matching_user_trainer AS g;
/* 프로모션 결제에 성공하면 데이터에 추가 */ INSERT INTO tb_matching_user_trainer ( trainer_user_matching_code, trainer_promotion_notice_code, user_id, trainer_id, user_coupon_code, trainer_promotion_name, payment_method_name, purchase_money, purchase_reg_date, purchase_finish_date, user_reg_date, trainer_promotion_recruit_start_date, trainer_promtion_recruit_end_date, trainer_promotion_attend_start_date, trainer_promotion_recruit_close_date, trainer_matching_system_reg_date) VALUES ( #{trainerUserMatchingCode}, #{trainerPromotionNoticeCode}, #{userId}, #{trainerId}, #{userCouponCode jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{promotionName}, #{paymentMethodName}, #{purchaseMoney}, NOW(), NOW(), NOW(), #{trainerPromotionRecruitStartDate}, #{trainerPromotionRecruitEndDate}, #{trainerPromotionAttendStartDate}, #{trainerPromotionRecruitCloseDate}, NOW())
